sentences.sContent: On the positive side, the theory asserts the paramountcy of rational choice in volitional human behavior, which sexual behavior is.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the positive side, the theory asserts the paramountcy of rational choice in volitional human behavior, which sexual behavior is.
sentences.sCn: 从实证的方面来说，这一理论坚持人类的意志性行为中理性选择是最高原则，性行为就是这样的行为。
